revised_title: The Ionisation of Dilute Solutions at the Freezing Point: A Study of Conductivity and Concentration
tldr: This study investigates the ionization of dilute solutions at the freezing point, focusing on the relationship between conductivity and concentration. The research examines various salts and acids, finding that the ionization decreases more rapidly at higher temperatures and that the drop in ionization at extreme dilution may be due to interactions with solvent impurities.
